resources.string: Mind your speed! Please drive safely!
Hydroplaning, wet leaves, ice, sleet, snow; the dangers are many on the road. When you lose traction on your car you will more or less kep on going unhindered, hitting anything in your path.
Even though the road is dry and the sun is shining, please do be cautious of the content on the road. In the summer heat the road may become slippery on its own.
If you pick up your phone and look at a text for 3 seconds, this is how far you will go with no knowledge of what\'s going on in front of and around you.
Shake phone gently to get back to main.
